body.name: Chef Buddy Microwave Maker, a Healthy Breakfast Utensil Kitchen Essentials, Easy to Make-Holds Up to Two Eggs and Cooks in 45 Seconds, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 55 mins
features: PERFECT EGGS EVERYTIME: This microwave egg maker is a cooking utensil that can deliver light, fluffy eggs in under a minute. To make your perfect eggs even more delicious, by adding sausage, bacon, ham, cheese, vegetables, or seasoning.

QUICK, CONVENIENT, AND SAFE: With the ability to make an egg in under a minute, this convenient cookware makes a breakfast sandwich a quick and convenient process. This cooker is microwave safe and made of food-safe plastic.

EASY TO CLEAN AND STORE: Clean-up consists of rinsing with hot soapy water, or alternatively putting it on the top shelf of your dish washer. This compact egg maker is light weight, which makes storing simple.
PRODUCT DETAILS: Materials: #5 Polypropylene Plastic Construction. Dimensions: 6.625” x 4.625” x 2.5”.
body.description: The Microwave Egg Maker by Chef Buddy is a quick and easy way to make a healthy and delicious breakfast with minimal clean-up time. This cooker can hold up to two eggs, cooks in under a minute, and is perfect for making breakfast sandwiches. This portable, microwave safe egg cooker is a perfect addition to any home or dorm room.IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. Chef Buddy is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on all of our products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous Quality Control process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: With this microwaveable container, it is easy to cook an egg in the microwave. A simple recipe: Spray container with Pam no stick cooking spray, add egg (slightly beaten), herbs and shredded fresh spinach. Cook for one minute (depending on your microwave wattage). Place cooked egg on an English muffin. If desired, add a piece of cheese. Simple and it is delicious! It’s like an egg McMuffin! Easy cleanup!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy clean-up and quick to use.
reviews.reviewText: Works well. Easy to clean up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, only takes 37 seconds and perfect every time…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works better 1 egg at a time. Bought 2 so I don’t have to clean as often. Just pop 1 in for 31 seconds then pop the other in for 31 seconds and I’m done. You can trust me I’ve done the research.Found that if done 2 eggs in 1 container the yolk cooks way faster than the whites so you end up with a super well done yolk and runny whites. If you do 2 containers with 1 egg in each but put them in at the same time they actually cook slower, if you increase the time to 45 seconds you end up with the above scenario, well done yolk and runny whites.The correct way is 1 at a time 31 seconds 🤌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing! It is super quick and easy to use for me to make an egg sandwich several days a week. It's the perfect size and is very durable. I've used it several times and it is still as good as new!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and clean
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use for a quick to egg omelette. I put a dab of butter in it, keep that for 15 seconds, cracked two eggs. Break the yolks, season to taste, and microwave for 1 minute 10 seconds in a thousand watt microwave. They come out nice and fluffy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No directions for a reason
reviews.reviewText: 1 egg, 45 seconds in microwave, center 2/3 was runny. Back in for another 45 seconds, looked good but cut into and center was runny. Added 30 seconds and it was finally cooked through. So my one egg, with salt and pepper, took 2 minutes to cook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fast and easy
reviews.reviewText: It's so easy to use and clean up is fast. Love it.
